title: [Self-directed] Comparative Simulation Workshop for Construction Surveying Education Duration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic construction site terminology and surveying equipment usage experience
context.additional_context: Workshop for mid-level professionals in managerial/leadership roles analyzing learning effectiveness differences between short-term/long-term courses through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can apply construction surveying theory in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy
Participants can compare and explain differences in learning outcomes between short-term/long-term courses (practical vs. theoretical assessments) in at least three ways
After completing the training, learners can select appropriate training duration types for their team by referencing SAT/TOLT score similarity cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
